page.title: 11LYCEUM THEATRE GHOSTS
page.content: We are very proud of our impressive Edwardian theatre, the Lyceum. The theatre was constucted on the grounds of an old Catholic Church and graveyard, which is the perfect recipe for tales of the supernatural. Lots of ghosts have been reported at the Lyceum Theatre, and these include a ballerina, a tramp, a monk, and a few forgotton actors who have been seen wandering aimlessly around. The conscience stricken monk haunts the lower area of the theatre, as does the ballerina who tragically hung herself in her dressing room after a performance. The Lyceum Theatre was exorcised by a Catholic priest in 1969, but to no avail, since all of the ghosts are still seen from time to time.
